content:
ProjectTaskElement Class

Definition

Represents a Task Element (MSBuild) in an MSBuild project.

In this Article

[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("{Name} Condition={Condition} ContinueOnError={ContinueOnError} MSBuildRuntime={MSBuildRuntime} MSBuildArchitecture={MSBuildArchitecture} #Outputs={Count}")]
public class ProjectTaskElement : Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElementContainer
Inheritance
Object
ProjectElement
Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElementContainer
ProjectTaskElement

Inherited Members

Condition
ConditionLocation

Properties

ContinueOnError

Gets or sets the ContinueOnError attribute value.

public string ContinueOnError { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the ContinueOnError attribute value. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

Remarks

Removes the ContinueOnError attribute if the value to set is set to null or an empty string.

ContinueOnErrorLocation

Location of the "ContinueOnError" attribute on this element, if any.

If there is no such attribute, returns null;

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation ContinueOnErrorLocation { get; }
Value
ElementLocation

Returns ElementLocation.

MSBuildArchitecture

Gets or sets the architecture value for the task.

Returns empty string if it is not present.

Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.

public string MSBuildArchitecture { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns String.

MSBuildArchitectureLocation

Location of the "MSBuildArchitecture" attribute on this element, if any.

If there is no such attribute, returns null;

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation MSBuildArchitectureLocation { get; }
Value
ElementLocation

Returns ElementLocation.

MSBuildRuntime

Gets or sets the runtime value for the task.

Returns empty string if it is not present.

Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.

public string MSBuildRuntime { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns String.

MSBuildRuntimeLocation

Location of the "MSBuildRuntime" attribute on this element, if any.

If there is no such attribute, returns null;

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation MSBuildRuntimeLocation { get; }
Value
ElementLocation

Returns ElementLocation.

Name

Gets the name of this task.

public string Name { get; }
Value
String

Returns the name of this task.

Outputs

Gets all Output Element (MSBuild) children.

public System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectOutputElement> Outputs { get; }
Value
ICollection<ProjectOutputElement>

Returns all Output element children.

ParameterLocations

Enumerable over the locations of parameters on the task.

Condition and ContinueOnError, which have their own properties, are not included in this collection.

If parameters differ only by case only the last one will be returned.

Hosts can still remove the other parameters by using RemoveAllParameters().

public System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string,Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation>> ParameterLocations { get; }
Value
IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<String,ElementLocation>>

Returns stem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.

Parameters

Gets all unevaluated parameters of this task.

public System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> Parameters { get; }
Value
IDictionary<String,String>

Returns all unevaluated parameters of this task.

Remarks

Condition and ContinueOnError attributes are not included in this collection. If parameters differ only by case then only the last one will be returned. See also RemoveAllParameters().

Methods

AddOutputItem(String,String)

Adds an Output item after the last child.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectOutputElement AddOutputItem (string taskParameter, string itemType);
taskParameter
String

The name of the task which outputs to the item.

itemType
String

The item type of the new item whose value is set to the output of the task.

Returns
ProjectOutputElement

Returns the added Output item.

AddOutputItem(String,String,String)

Adds a conditioned Output item to this task after the last child.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectOutputElement AddOutputItem (string taskParameter, string itemType, string condition);
taskParameter
String

The name of the parameter.

itemType
String

The item type of the item.

condition
String

The condition of the parameter.

Returns
ProjectOutputElement

Returns the added conditioned Output item.

AddOutputProperty(String,String)

Adds an Output property to this task after the last child.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectOutputElement AddOutputProperty (string taskParameter, string propertyName);
taskParameter
String

The name of the parameter.

propertyName
String

The name of the property.

Returns
ProjectOutputElement

Returns the added Output property.

AddOutputProperty(String,String,String)

Adds a conditioned Output property to this task after the last child.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectOutputElement AddOutputProperty (string taskParameter, string propertyName, string condition);
taskParameter
String

The name of the parameter.

propertyName
String

The name of the property.

condition
String

The condition of the property.

Returns
ProjectOutputElement

Returns the added conditioned Output property.

GetParameter(String)

Gets the value of the parameter with the specified name.

public string GetParameter (string name);
name
String

The name of the parameter.

Returns
String

Returns the value of the parameter with the specified name. If no parameter by that name exists in the task, returns an empty string.

RemoveAllParameters()

Removes all parameters from the task. Does not remove any ContinueOnError and/or Condition attributes.

public void RemoveAllParameters ();

RemoveParameter(String)

Removes any parameter on this task with the specified name. If no parameter by that name exists in the task, does nothing.

public void RemoveParameter (string name);
name
String

The name of the parameter to remove.

SetParameter(String,String)

Updates or adds a parameter on this task

public void SetParameter (string name, string unevaluatedValue);
name
String

The name of the parameter to update or add.

unevaluatedValue
String

The value of the parameter.

Remarks

Updates the parameter to the specified value if a parameter by that name exists in the task. Otherwise, creates a parameter with the specified name and value, and adds it to the task.
